remarks: Lemma for ~ ostth .  If two absolute values agree on the positive integers greater than one, then they agree for all rational numbers and thus are equal as functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2014.)
statement:
qrng.q $e |- Q = ( CCfld |`s QQ ) $.
qabsabv.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` Q ) $.
ostthlem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. A ) $.
ostthlem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. A ) $.
ostthlem1.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) ) -> ( F ` n ) = ( G ` n ) ) $.
ostthlem1 $p |- ( ph -> F = G ) $.
$d A n $.
$d F n $.
$d G n $.
$d Q n $.
$d n ph $.
